---
title: Sciatic Frequency Index (SFI)
---

This is the sister test that pairs with the [*sciatic bothersome index*]({{< var ref-sciatic-bothersome-index.path >}})

Items are scored on a 7pt scale based on the following items:

- Not at all
- Very rarely
- A few times
- About half the time
- Usually Almost always
- Always



- Leg Pain
- Numbness or tingling in the foot or groin
- Weakness in the leg or foot
- Back or leg pain while sitting
